definition: jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province

sentences.english: Objective To study different thick agarose gel how to impact the DNA electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究不同厚度的瓊脂糖凝膠對電泳的影響。

sentences.english: As media of electrophoresis, optimum concentration of agarose was 2%.
sentences.chinese: 用於電泳介質的瓊脂糖最佳濃度爲2%。

sentences.english: Granulosa cell apoptosis was detected by agarose gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 用瓊脂糖凝膠電泳檢測兩類卵的顆粒細胞凋亡。

sentences.english: DNA ladder was showed by agarose gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 瓊脂糖凝膠電泳測定DNA梯狀帶。

sentences.english: The specimens were prepared with hot agar centrifugation for ultra-thin sections and observed with transmission electron microscopy(TEM).
sentences.chinese: 熱瓊脂離心法制備電鏡樣品，透射電鏡觀察。

sentences.english: DNA ladder was detected by agarose gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 瓊脂糖凝膠電泳檢測DNA梯狀條帶。

sentences.english: Avian Escherichia coli pili antigen was detected with agar gel diffusion precipitin test.
sentences.chinese: 用瓊脂擴散沉澱反應檢測了大腸桿菌菌毛抗原。

sentences.english: Spirochetes and organisms that show gliding movement can move over or through an agar gel .
sentences.chinese: 螺旋體和其他滑動的生物能在瓊脂表面或裏面滑行。

sentences.english: The DNA fragmentation was examined by agarose gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 瓊脂糖凝膠電泳檢測染色質DNA斷裂。

sentences.english: The plasmid was obtained and identified by alkali splitting and gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 鹼裂解法抽提質粒，瓊脂糖電泳分析目的質粒。

sentences.english: Any culture medium that uses agar as the gelling agent.
sentences.chinese: 任何一種用瓊脂作膠凝劑的培養基。

sentences.english: Agar is complex polysaccharide, extracted from red algae .
sentences.chinese: 瓊脂是一種從紅藻中提取的複雜的多糖。

sentences.english: Methods The mouldflora were detected by Czapek agar plate method.
sentences.chinese: 方法用蔡氏瓊脂子板法測定黴菌污染率和侵染率。

sentences.english: Methods Soft agar assay and nude mouse tumorigenicity assay were used.
sentences.chinese: 方法軟瓊脂集落形成試驗和裸鼠成瘤實驗。

sentences.english: Methods Agar dilution method was used to study the dose - effect relationship of antibiotic effect.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用瓊脂稀釋法進行抗菌作用量效關係的研究。
